resources.string: WHoL combines the comfort of your couch with the convenience of Wake on Lan. Control your computer\'s power with just a few taps on your Android TV - no need to leave your cozy spot!

IP Address: Your computer's digital location.
MAC Address: The unique identifier for your device.
Port Number: The secret code to awaken your computer.
Open source: Enjoy an app made from pure love
Effortless: Turn your computer on without moving an inch.
